name: Fish Poop
description:
There are 8 sharks you must defeat in order to win. There are 15 green pellets to eat if your health is low. Sharks kill you instantly, so watch out. If your health is below 50% you must eat to be able to poop on the sharks. Dodge the Buoys and the hooks.   
*Make sure to put this game in full screen*
Controls:
Up/Down/Left/Right Arrow to move/rotate
J to Poop
K to Pee
F to Restart
This game was made in Construct 2, a free game engine that you can get without needing to code.
